description: Sun shines, and you head for the crags. Rainy days – or a quick climb after work – means a trip to the gym. However and whatever you’re climbing, these are the shorts that keep you moving. Cool, comfortable, and hardwearing, our lightweight Konseal is made with Fortius™ Air 50, a nylon plain wave that stretches for freedom on the rock and approach. The belt design secures the fit and rides comfortably under a harness, and multiple pockets include an easy-access zippered one at the thigh.
name: Arcteryx Konseal Lightweight Shorts, 11" Inseam - Mens
